item.title: Identifying, attributing, and overcoming common data quality issues of manned station observation
item.description: Information Identifying, attributing, and overcoming common data quality issues of manned station observations Authors: Hunziker et al. Year: 2017 Journal: International Journal of Climatology DOI: 10.1002/joc.5037 Tags: [Pe] Peru. [WS] Weather stations. [DQ] Data quality. Notes Introduction To ensure high quality of climatological analysis (such as trends and extremes), the need of high quality data is a must. As a consequence, quality control becomes then an important step to do.
